title: Crimson
description:
Crimson revolves around a young man named Alex Elder who is attacked by a gang of vampires while out late with his friends. Bitten, Alex is saved by Erikmos, the last of an ancient race pre-dating vampires, who claims Alex is the chosen one. As the chosen one, he will bring an end to vampirekind. The series follows Alex as he adjusts to life as a vampire and shoulders the responsibilities of the chosen one.

Crimson was created by artist Humberto Ramos and scripter Brian Augustyn from story concepts by F.G. Haghenbeck and Oscar Pinto.


Released on http://ComicPirates.info
